code: import{auth}from"../firebase";import{signInWithEmailAndPassword,signOut,onAuthStateChanged}from"firebase/auth";export const login=async(email,password)=>{try{await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);return true;}catch(error){console.error("Login error:",error);return false;}};export const logout=async()=>{try{await signOut(auth);}catch(error){console.error("Logout error:",error);}};export const onAuthChange=callback=>{return onAuthStateChanged(auth,callback);};
